main event: A luminous green, red, and yellow object, about two meters long, was observed moving from west to east at an altitude of about 500 meters over Iran on March 21, 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as luminous, with a length of around two meters.
The object was observed moving from west to east at an altitude of approximately 500 meters.
The sighting was reported as one of many sightings of unknown objects observed on the Soviet-Iranian border.
The object's appearance and behavior were not characteristic of a known aerial vehicle.
The sighting was evaluated as a probable meteor.
sighted object: A luminous green, red, and yellow object
